feed.title: Invoice Ninja Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.12.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for Mollie gateway fee removal
  • Add Task Time Logs to check data script
  • Additional task time log validation rules
  • Fixes for page number alignment
  • Updated Livewire dependencies
  • v5.12.7 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/11109

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.12.6...v5.12.7

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.12.8
New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.12.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for Restoring backups
  • Fixes for Zugferd using Tax Exempt codes
  • Fixes for Quote imports
  • Fixes for Expense document count
  • Fixes for filters in product sales reports
  • Add migration to update Blockonomics site URL by @cnohall in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/11135
  • v5.12.9 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/11159

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.12.8...v5.12.9

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.12.10
